verbose_text: Nevertheless, several studies showed that PAP1 overexpression alone was not sufficient for the activation of anthocyanin biosynthesis in the dark or under low light conditions [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR], which suggests that the accumulation of other factors such as bHLH or HY5 proteins in response to light is needed to activate anthocyanin pathway gene expression.
